CustomField.description: For 'Summary Buffer' agents, this specifies a specialized AI Agent Definition that will be used for summarization tasks instead of the primary agent's LLM. This allows for cost optimization and domain-specific summarization.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. Select a specialized summarizer agent to handle summarization tasks. If left blank, the primary agent's LLM will be used for summarization.
CustomField.label: Summarizer Agent
